Package circuitbuilder

Class LogicGateIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • circuitbuilder.LogicGateIO
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Input, Output
    abstract class LogicGateIO
extends java.lang.Object
    abstract 'template' for the connectingInput and connectingOutput classes.
    Author:
    elliot
